vernac_cmds: From mathcomp Require Import ssrfun ssrbool ssrnat eqtype seq.
From QuickChick Require Import GenLowInterface GenHighInterface RandomQC Tactics Sets Show.
Lemma nthE T (def : T) s i : List.nth i s def = nth def s i.
elim: s i => [|x s IHs i]; first by case.
Definition liftGen {A B} (f: A -> B) (a : G A) : G B := nosimpl (bindGen a (fun x => returnGen (f x))).
Definition liftGen2 {A1 A2 B} (C : A1 -> A2 -> B) (m1 : G A1) (m2 : G A2) : G B:= nosimpl (bindGen m1 (fun x1 => bindGen m2 (fun x2 => returnGen (C x1 x2)))).

Definition liftGen3 {A1 A2 A3 R} (F : A1 -> A2 -> A3 -> R) (m1 : G A1) (m2 : G A2) (m3 : G A3) : G R := nosimpl( bindGen m1 (fun x1 => bindGen m2 (fun x2 => bindGen m3 (fun x3 => returnGen (F x1 x2 x3))))).

Definition liftGen4 {A1 A2 A3 A4 R} (F : A1 -> A2 -> A3 -> A4 -> R) (m1 : G A1) (m2 : G A2) (m3 : G A3) (m4: G A4) : G R := nosimpl( bindGen m1 (fun x1 => bindGen m2 (fun x2 => bindGen m3 (fun x3 => bindGen m4 (fun x4 => returnGen (F x1 x2 x3 x4)))))).

Definition liftGen5 {A1 A2 A3 A4 A5 R} (F : A1 -> A2 -> A3 -> A4 -> A5 -> R) (m1 : G A1) (m2 : G A2) (m3 : G A3) (m4: G A4) (m5 : G A5) : G R := nosimpl( bindGen m1 (fun x1 => bindGen m2 (fun x2 => bindGen m3 (fun x3 => bindGen m4 (fun x4 => bindGen m5 (fun x5 => returnGen (F x1 x2 x3 x4 x5))))))).
Definition sequenceGen {A : Type} (ms : list (G A)) : G (list A) := foldr (fun m m' => bindGen m (fun x => bindGen m' (fun xs => returnGen (x :: xs)))) (returnGen [::]) ms.
Fixpoint foldGen {A B : Type} (f : A -> B -> G A) (l : list B) (a : A) : G A := nosimpl( match l with | [::] => returnGen a | (x :: xs) => bindGen (f a x) (foldGen f xs) end).
Definition oneOf_ {A : Type} (def: G A) (gs : list (G A)) : G A := bindGen (choose (0, length gs - 1)) (nth def gs).
Definition oneof {A} := @deprecate (G A -> list (G A) -> G A) "oneof" "oneOf_" oneOf_.
Fixpoint pick {A : Type} (def : G A) (xs : list (nat * G A)) n : nat * G A := match xs with | nil => (0, def) | (k, x) :: xs => if (n < k) then (k, x) else pick def xs (n - k) end.

Fixpoint pickDrop {A : Type} (xs : list (nat * G (option A))) n : nat * G (option A) * list (nat * G (option A)) := match xs with | nil => (0, returnGen None, nil) | (k, x) :: xs => if (n < k) then (k, x, xs) else let '(k', x', xs') := pickDrop xs (n - k) in (k', x', (k,x)::xs') end.
Definition sum_fst {A : Type} (gs : list (nat * A)) : nat := foldl (fun t p => t + (fst p)) 0 gs.
Definition freq_ {A : Type} (def : G A) (gs : list (nat * G A)) : G A := let tot := sum_fst gs in bindGen (choose (0, tot-1)) (fun n => @snd _ _ (pick def gs n)).
Definition frequency {A}:= @deprecate (G A -> list (nat * G A) -> G A) "frequency" "freq_" freq_.

Fixpoint backtrackFuel {A : Type} (fuel : nat) (tot : nat) (gs : list (nat * G (option A))) : G (option A) := match fuel with | O => returnGen None | S fuel' => bindGen (choose (0, tot-1)) (fun n => let '(k, g, gs') := pickDrop gs n in bindGen g (fun ma => match ma with | Some a => returnGen (Some a) | None => backtrackFuel fuel' (tot - k) gs' end )) end.
Definition backtrack {A : Type} (gs : list (nat * G (option A))) : G (option A) := backtrackFuel (length gs) (sum_fst gs) gs.
Definition vectorOf {A : Type} (k : nat) (g : G A) : G (list A) := foldr (fun m m' => bindGen m (fun x => bindGen m' (fun xs => returnGen (cons x xs))) ) (returnGen nil) (nseq k g).
Definition listOf {A : Type} (g : G A) : G (list A) := sized (fun n => bindGen (choose (0, n)) (fun k => vectorOf k g)).
Definition elems_ {A : Type} (def : A) (l : list A) := let n := length l in bindGen (choose (0, n - 1)) (fun n' => returnGen (List.nth n' l def)).
Definition elements {A} := @deprecate (A -> list A -> G A) "elements" "elems_" elems_.
Definition bindGenOpt {A B} (g : G (option A)) (f : A -> G (option B)) : G (option B) := bindGen g (fun ma => match ma with | None => returnGen None | Some a => f a end).

Definition retryBody {A : Type} (retry : nat -> G (option A) -> G (option A)) (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) : G (option A) := bindGen g (fun x => match x, n with | Some a, _ => returnGen (Some a) | None, O => returnGen None | None, S n' => retry n' g end).
Fixpoint retry {A : Type} (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) : G (option A) := retryBody retry n g.
Definition suchThatMaybe1 {A : Type} (g : G A) (p : A -> bool) : G (option A) := fmap (fun x => if p x then Some x else None) g.
Definition suchThatMaybe {A : Type} (g : G A) (p : A -> bool) : G (option A) := sized (fun n => retry n (suchThatMaybe1 g p)).

Definition suchThatMaybeOpt {A : Type} (g : G (option A)) (p : A -> bool) : G (option A) := sized (fun n => retry n (fmap (fun x => match x with | None => None | Some a => if p a then Some a else None end) g)).
Definition retrySized {A : Type} (g : G (option A)) : G (option A) := sized (fun n => retry n g).
Lemma semLiftGen {A B} (f: A -> B) (g: G A) : semGen (liftGen f g) <--> f @: semGen g.
by rewrite semBindSize (eq_bigcupr _ (fun a => semReturnSize (f a) size)).

Ltac solveLiftGenX := intros; split; intros; repeat match goal with | [ H : exists _, _ |- _ ] => destruct H as [? [? ?]] | [ H : semGenSize _ _ _ |- _ ] => try (apply semBindSize in H; destruct H as [? [? ?]]); try (apply semReturnSize in H; subst) end; [ by repeat (eexists; split; [eassumption |]) | repeat (apply semBindSize; eexists; split; try eassumption); by apply semReturnSize ].
Lemma semLiftGenSize {A B} (f: A -> B) (g: G A) size : semGenSize (liftGen f g) size <--> f @: (semGenSize g size).
by rewrite semBindSize (eq_bigcupr _ (fun a => semReturnSize (f a) size)).
Program Instance liftGenUnsized {A B} (f : A -> B) (g : G A) `{Unsized _ g} : Unsized (liftGen f g).
Program Instance liftGenMonotonic {A B} (f : A -> B) (g : G A) `{SizeMonotonic _ g} : SizeMonotonic (liftGen f g).
Lemma semLiftGen2Size {A1 A2 B} (f: A1 -> A2 -> B) (g1 : G A1) (g2 : G A2) s : semGenSize (liftGen2 f g1 g2) s <--> f @2: (semGenSize g1 s, semGenSize g2 s).
rewrite semBindSize curry_imset2l; apply: eq_bigcupr => x.
by rewrite semBindSize; apply: eq_bigcupr => y; rewrite semReturnSize.
Lemma semLiftGen2SizeMonotonic {A1 A2 B} (f: A1 -> A2 -> B) (g1 : G A1) (g2 : G A2) `{SizeMonotonic _ g1} `{SizeMonotonic _ g2} : semGen (liftGen2 f g1 g2) <--> f @2: (semGen g1, semGen g2).
split => /=; (eapply monotonic; last eassumption); apply/leP; solve [ apply Max.le_max_l | apply Max.le_max_r ].
Lemma semLiftGen2Unsized1 {A1 A2 B} (f: A1 -> A2 -> B) (g1 : G A1) (g2 : G A2) `{Unsized _ g1}: semGen (liftGen2 f g1 g2) <--> f @2: (semGen g1, semGen g2).
split; auto; split; eexists; split; eauto; reflexivity.
eapply unsized; eauto; apply (unsized2 H); eauto.
Lemma semLiftGen2Unsized2 {A1 A2 B} (f: A1 -> A2 -> B) (g1 : G A1) (g2 : G A2) `{Unsized _ g2}: semGen (liftGen2 f g1 g2) <--> f @2: (semGen g1, semGen g2).
split; auto; split; eexists; split; eauto; reflexivity.

Lemma semLiftGen3Size : forall {A1 A2 A3 B} (f: A1 -> A2 -> A3 -> B) (g1: G A1) (g2: G A2) (g3: G A3) size, semGenSize (liftGen3 f g1 g2 g3) size <--> fun b => exists a1, semGenSize g1 size a1 /\ (exists a2, semGenSize g2 size a2 /\ (exists a3, semGenSize g3 size a3 /\ (f a1 a2 a3) = b)).
Program Instance liftGen2Unsized {A1 A2 B} (f : A1 -> A2 -> B) (g1 : G A1) `{Unsized _ g1} (g2 : G A2) `{Unsized _ g2} : Unsized (liftGen2 f g1 g2).
Program Instance liftGen2Monotonic {A1 A2 B} (f : A1 -> A2 -> B) (g1 : G A1) `{SizeMonotonic _ g1} (g2 : G A2) `{SizeMonotonic _ g2} : SizeMonotonic (liftGen2 f g1 g2).
do 2 (eexists; split; first by eapply (monotonic H1); eauto).

Lemma semLiftGen4Size A1 A2 A3 A4 B (f : A1 -> A2 -> A3 -> A4 -> B) (g1 : G A1) (g2 : G A2) (g3 : G A3) (g4 : G A4) s : semGenSize (liftGen4 f g1 g2 g3 g4) s <--> [set b : B | exists a1 a2 a3 a4, semGenSize g1 s a1 /\ semGenSize g2 s a2 /\ semGenSize g3 s a3 /\ semGenSize g4 s a4 /\ f a1 a2 a3 a4 = b].
repeat match goal with | [ H : semGenSize _ _ _ |- _ ] => try (apply semBindSize in H; destruct H as [? [? ?]]); try (apply semReturnSize in H; subst) end.
repeat match goal with | [ H : exists _, _ |- _ ] => destruct H as [? [? ?]] | [ H : and _ _ |- _ ] => destruct H as [? ?] end.

Lemma semLiftGen4SizeMonotonic A1 A2 A3 A4 B (f : A1 -> A2 -> A3 -> A4 -> B) (g1 : G A1) (g2 : G A2) (g3 : G A3) (g4 : G A4) `{SizeMonotonic _ g1} `{SizeMonotonic _ g2} `{SizeMonotonic _ g3} `{SizeMonotonic _ g4} : semGen (liftGen4 f g1 g2 g3 g4) <--> [set b : B | exists a1 a2 a3 a4, semGen g1 a1 /\ semGen g2 a2 /\ semGen g3 a3 /\ semGen g4 a4 /\ f a1 a2 a3 a4 = b].
repeat split; (eapply monotonic; [ apply/leP | ]; last eassumption).

Program Instance liftGen4Monotonic {A B C D E} (f : A -> B -> C -> D -> E) (g1 : G A) (g2 : G B) (g3 : G C) (g4 : G D) `{ SizeMonotonic _ g1} `{ SizeMonotonic _ g2} `{ SizeMonotonic _ g3} `{ SizeMonotonic _ g4} : SizeMonotonic (liftGen4 f g1 g2 g3 g4).
repeat (split; try reflexivity); by eapply monotonic; eauto.

Lemma semLiftGen5Size : forall {A1 A2 A3 A4 A5 B} (f: A1 -> A2 -> A3 -> A4 -> A5 -> B) (g1: G A1) (g2: G A2) (g3: G A3) (g4: G A4) (g5: G A5) size, semGenSize (liftGen5 f g1 g2 g3 g4 g5) size <--> fun b => exists a1, semGenSize g1 size a1 /\ (exists a2, semGenSize g2 size a2 /\ (exists a3, semGenSize g3 size a3 /\ (exists a4, semGenSize g4 size a4 /\ (exists a5, semGenSize g5 size a5 /\ (f a1 a2 a3 a4 a5) = b)))).
Lemma Forall2_cons T U (P : T -> U -> Prop) x1 s1 x2 s2 : List.Forall2 P (x1 :: s1) (x2 :: s2) <-> P x1 x2 /\ List.Forall2 P s1 s2.
Lemma semSequenceGenSize A (gs : list (G A)) n : semGenSize (sequenceGen gs) n <--> [set l | length l = length gs /\ List.Forall2 (fun y => semGenSize y n) gs l].
by rewrite semReturnSize /set1; case=> // a l; split=> // [[]].
rewrite /= semBindSize; setoid_rewrite semBindSize; setoid_rewrite semReturnSize.
rewrite Forall2_cons; split; first by case=> y [gen_y [s [[<- ?]]]] [<- <-].
by case=> [[<-] [? ?]]; exists x; split => //; exists l; split.
Lemma Forall2_SizeMonotonic {A} x n (gs : list (G A)) l : x <= n -> gs \subset SizeMonotonic -> List.Forall2 (semGenSize^~ x) gs l -> List.Forall2 (semGenSize^~ n) gs l.
Lemma semSequenceGenSizeMonotonic A (gs : list (G A)) : (gs \subset SizeMonotonic) -> semGen (sequenceGen gs) <--> [set l | length l = length gs /\ List.Forall2 semGen gs l].
induction l; intros gs H H1 H2.
Lemma semVectorOfSize {A : Type} (k : nat) (g : G A) n : semGenSize (vectorOf k g) n <--> [set l | length l = k /\ l \subset (semGenSize g n)].
by case=> [[?]] /subconsset [? ?]; exists x; split => //; exists l.
Lemma semVectorOfUnsized {A} (g : G A) (k : nat) `{Unsized _ g}: semGen (vectorOf k g) <--> [set l | length l = k /\ l \subset semGen g ].
Program Instance vectorOfUnsized {A} (k : nat) (g : G A) `{Unsized _ g } : Unsized (vectorOf k g).
split; move => [H1 H2]; split => //; by rewrite unsized; eauto.
Program Instance vectorOfMonotonic {A} (k : nat) (g : G A) `{SizeMonotonic _ g } : SizeMonotonic (vectorOf k g).
move => l [H1 H2]; split => // a Ha.
Lemma semListOfSize {A : Type} (g : G A) size : semGenSize (listOf g) size <--> [set l | length l <= size /\ l \subset (semGenSize g size)].
Lemma semListOfUnsized {A} (g : G A) (k : nat) `{Unsized _ g} : semGen (listOf g) <--> [set l | l \subset semGen g ].
Program Instance listOfMonotonic {A} (g : G A) `{SizeMonotonic _ g } : SizeMonotonic (listOf g).
Lemma In_nth_exists {A} (l: list A) x def : List.In x l -> exists n, nth def l n = x /\ (n < length l)%coq_nat.
Lemma nth_imset T (def : T) l : nth def l @: [set n | n < length l] <--> l.
case: l => [|x l] t; first by split=> //; case=> ?; rewrite ltn0; case.
split; first by case=> n [? <-]; rewrite -nthE; apply/List.nth_In/ltP.
by case/(In_nth_exists _ _ def) => n [? ?]; exists n; split=> //; apply/ltP.
Lemma semOneofSize {A} (l : list (G A)) (def : G A) s : semGenSize (oneof def l) s <--> if l is nil then semGenSize def s else \bigcup_(x in l) semGenSize x s.
by rewrite (reindex_bigcup (nth def (g :: l)) X) // /X subn1 nth_imset.
Lemma semOneof {A} (l : list (G A)) (def : G A) : semGen (oneof def l) <--> if l is nil then semGen def else \bigcup_(x in l) semGen x.
by case: l => [|g l]; rewrite 1?bigcupC; apply: eq_bigcupr => sz; apply: semOneofSize.
Program Instance oneofMonotonic {A} (x : G A) (l : list (G A)) `{ SizeMonotonic _ x} `(l \subset SizeMonotonic) : SizeMonotonic (oneof x l).
elim : l H0 => [_ | g gs IH /subconsset [H2 H3]] /=.
Lemma semElementsSize {A} (l: list A) (def : A) s : semGenSize (elements def l) s <--> if l is nil then [set def] else l.
Lemma semElements {A} (l: list A) (def : A) : (semGen (elements def l)) <--> if l is nil then [set def] else l.
Program Instance elementsUnsized {A} {def : A} (l : list A) : Unsized (elements def l).
Lemma not_lt : forall n m, (false = (n < m)) -> (m <= n).
by elim: n m=> [| n IHn]; case.
Lemma sum_fstE A x (a : A) l: sum_fst ((x, a) :: l) = x + sum_fst l.
elim: l 0 x => [n x|[n1 x1] l IHl p q] /=; first by rewrite addnC.
by rewrite -IHl; congr foldl; rewrite addnAC.
Lemma sum_fst_eq0P {A} (l : list (nat * A)) : sum_fst l = 0 <-> [seq x <- l | x.1 != 0] = [::].
by elim: l => [|[[|n] x] l IHl] //=; split=> //; rewrite sum_fstE.
Lemma pick_def : forall {A} (l: list (nat * G A)) n def, sum_fst l <= n -> pick def l n = (0, def).
move=> A l n def Hleq.
case=> //= i p l IHl n Hleq.
case: b Heqb => Heqb; symmetry in Heqb.
have : (i + sum_fst l) < i by eapply (leq_ltn_trans); eassumption.
by have -> : forall i, (i - i) = 0 by elim.
Lemma pick_exists : forall {A} (l: list (nat * G A)) n def, n < sum_fst l <-> exists x, List.In x l /\ pick def l n = x /\ fst x <> 0.
case => i p xs IHxs n Hlt.
rewrite -(ltn_add2r i) [X in _ < X]addnC subnK // in IHxs.
Lemma pick_In : forall {A} (l: list (nat * G A)) x def, List.In x l /\ fst x <> 0 -> exists n, pick def l n = x.
move => A l x def [HIn Hfst].
case => //= i g xs IHxs [H1 | H2]; subst.
have H : 0 < i by elim : i Hfst IHxs => //=.
by rewrite -[X in _ - X]add0n subnDr subn0.
Lemma pick_imset A (def : G A) l : pick def l @: [set m | m < sum_fst l] <--> [seq x <- l | x.1 != 0].
by rewrite sum_fstE add0n subn0 => lt_y <-; exists y.
by case=> y [lt_y <-]; exists y; split=> //; rewrite subn0.
right; rewrite -(IHl t); exists (p - n.+1); split=> //.
by rewrite -(ltn_add2r n.+1) subnK 1?addnC // leqNgt lt_pn.
case=> [<-|]; first by exists 0; split => //; rewrite sum_fstE.
rewrite -(IHl t); case=> p [lt_p <-]; exists (n.+1 + p); split.
Lemma pickDrop_def : forall {A} (l: list (nat * G (option A))) n, sum_fst l <= n -> pickDrop l n = (0, returnGen None, l).
case=> //= i p l IHl n Hleq.
case: b Heqb => Heqb; symmetry in Heqb.
have : (i + sum_fst l) < i by eapply (leq_ltn_trans); eassumption.
by have -> : forall i, (i - i) = 0 by elim.

Lemma pickDrop_exists : forall {A} (l: list (nat * G (option A))) n, n < sum_fst l <-> exists k g l', List.In (k,g) l /\ pickDrop l n = (k,g,l') /\ k <> 0 /\ l <--> [set (k, g)] :|: l' /\ length l' + 1 = length l /\ sum_fst l' + k = sum_fst l.
case => i p xs IHxs n Hlt.
rewrite -(ltn_add2r i) [X in _ < X]addnC subnK // in IHxs.
split; [right | split; [| split; [| split; [| split]]]]; try (simpl; eauto; by rewrite H2).
Lemma pickDrop_In : forall {A} (l: list (nat * G (option A))) k x, List.In (k,x) l /\ k <> 0 -> exists n l', pickDrop l n = (k,x,l').
move => A l k x [HIn Hfst].
case => //= i g xs IHxs [H1 | H2]; subst.
have H : 0 < k by elim : k Hfst IHxs => //=.
Lemma pickDrop_In_strong : forall {A} (l: list (nat * G (option A))) k x, List.In (k,x) l /\ k <> 0 -> exists n l', pickDrop l n = (k,x,l') /\ n < sum_fst l /\ length l = length l' + 1.
move => A l k x [HIn Hfst].
case => //= i g xs IHxs [H1 | H2]; subst.
have H : 0 < k by elim : k Hfst IHxs => //=.

Lemma semFrequencySize {A} (l : list (nat * G A)) (def : G A) (size: nat) : semGenSize (frequency def l) size <--> let l' := [seq x <- l | x.1 != 0] in if l' is nil then semGenSize def size else \bigcup_(x in l') semGenSize x.2 size.
case lsupp: {1}[seq x <- l | x.1 != 0] => [|[n g] gs].
by move=> n; split; rewrite leqn0; [move/eqP|] => ->.
by rewrite lsupp; case: (sum_fst l) => // /(_ erefl).
have->: (fun a : nat => a <= sum_fst l - 1) <--> [set m | m < sum_fst l].
by move=> m /=; rewrite -ltnS subn1 prednK.
Lemma semFrequency {A} (l : list (nat * G A)) (def : G A) : semGen (frequency def l) <--> let l' := [seq x <- l | x.1 != 0] in if l' is nil then semGen def else \bigcup_(x in l') semGen x.2.
by case lsupp: {1}[seq x <- l | x.1 != 0] => [|[n g] gs] /=; rewrite 1?bigcupC; apply: eq_bigcupr => sz; have := (semFrequencySize l def sz); rewrite lsupp.
Lemma frequencySizeMonotonic {A} (g0 : G A) lg : SizeMonotonic g0 -> List.Forall (fun p => SizeMonotonic (snd p)) lg -> SizeMonotonic (frequency g0 lg).
edestruct (pick_exists lg x g0) as [[[n' g] [Hin [Hp Hg]]] H2].
unfold leq, super, ChooseNat, OrdNat in Hep1, Heq2.
Instance frequencySizeMonotonic_alt : forall {A : Type} (g0 : G A) (lg : seq (nat * G A)), SizeMonotonic g0 -> lg \subset [set x | SizeMonotonic x.2 ] -> SizeMonotonic (frequency g0 lg).
intros A g ls Hm Hin.
Lemma semBacktrackFuelDef {A} fuel (l : list (nat * G (option A))) size : sum_fst l = 0 -> semGenSize (backtrackFuel fuel 0 l) size <--> [set None].
Lemma in_memP {A : eqType} x (l : seq A) : reflect (List.In x l) (x \in l)%bool.
destruct (x == a) eqn:Heq; move : Heq => /eqP Heq; subst; simpl.
Lemma forall_leq_sum_fst {A} (l : list (nat * A)) : forall a n, seq_In l (n, a) -> n <= sum_fst l.
elim : l => [| [n a] l IH]; auto.
move => n' a' /= [[H1 H2] | H2]; subst.
Lemma pickDrop_leq_top {A} (l : seq (nat * G (option A))) (n : nat) k g l' size s : pickDrop l n = (k, g, l') -> semGenSize g size (Some s) -> n < sum_fst l.
elim : l => [|[m a] l IH] n l' /= Hpd Hgen.
destruct (pickDrop l (n - m)) as [[k' x'] xs'] eqn:Heq.

Lemma backtrackFuelSizeMonotonic {A : Type} tot fuel (lg : seq (nat * G (option A))) : sum_fst lg = tot -> length lg = fuel -> lg \subset [set x | SizeMonotonic x.2 ] -> SizeMonotonic (backtrackFuel fuel tot lg).
unfold leq, super, ChooseNat, OrdNat in Hin.
Lemma pickDrop_subset {A} (l1 l2 : seq (nat * G (option A))) (n m : nat) g : pickDrop l1 n = (m, g, l2) -> l2 \subset l1.
induction l1; simpl in *; intros n l2 H1.
destruct (pickDrop l1 (n - k)) as [[k' x'] xs'] eqn:Heq.
Lemma length_sum_lst {A} (l : list (nat * A)) : length l = 0 -> sum_fst l = 0.
destruct l; eauto; intros H; inv H.
Lemma pickDrop_sum_fst {A} (lg : seq (nat * G (option A))) n : sum_fst lg = 0 -> exists l, pickDrop lg n = (0, returnGen None, l) /\ sum_fst l = 0.
Lemma backtrackFuel_sum_fst {A} fuel tot (lg : seq (nat * G (option A))) s : sum_fst lg = 0 -> semGenSize (backtrackFuel fuel tot lg) s <--> [set None].
revert lg tot; induction fuel; simpl; intros lg tot Heq.
edestruct (@pickDrop_sum_fst A) with (n := n) as [l' [H3 H4]].

Lemma backtrackFuel_list_mon {A : Type} tot1 tot2 fuel1 fuel2 (lg1 lg2 : seq (nat * G (option A))) s : sum_fst lg1 = tot1 -> length lg1 = fuel1 -> sum_fst lg2 = tot2 -> length lg2 = fuel2 -> lg1 \subset lg2 -> isSome :&: semGenSize (backtrackFuel fuel1 tot1 lg1) s \subset isSome :&: semGenSize (backtrackFuel fuel2 tot2 lg2) s.
move : tot1 tot2 fuel2 lg1 lg2 s.
induction fuel1; intros tot1 tot2 fuel2 lg1 lg2 s Htot1 Hf1 Htot2 Hf2 Hsub x [Hs Hin]; destruct x; try discriminate; split; auto.
eapply semReturnSize in Hin; inv Hin.
apply backtrackFuel_sum_fst in Hin; auto; inv Hin.
destruct (pickDrop lg1 n) as [[k g] gs'] eqn:Heq.
unfold leq, super, ChooseNat, OrdNat in *.

Lemma backtrackFuelSizeMonotonicOpt {A : Type} tot fuel (lg : seq (nat * G (option A))) : sum_fst lg = tot -> length lg = fuel -> lg \subset [set x | SizeMonotonicOpt x.2 ] -> SizeMonotonicOpt (backtrackFuel fuel tot lg).
intros s1 s2 Hleq x H.
destruct tot; auto; apply backtrackFuel_sum_fst in H; auto.

rewrite Hdrop in Heqd; inv Heqd.
apply semReturnSize; apply semReturnSize in Hf; auto.
Corollary backtrackSizeMonotonic {A : Type} (lg : seq (nat * G (option A))) : lg \subset [set x | SizeMonotonic x.2 ] -> SizeMonotonic (backtrack lg).
Corollary backtrackSizeMonotonicOpt {A : Type} (lg : seq (nat * G (option A))) : lg \subset [set x | SizeMonotonicOpt x.2 ] -> SizeMonotonicOpt (backtrack lg).

Lemma semBacktrackFuel {A} tot fuel (l : list (nat * G (option A))) size : sum_fst l = tot -> length l = fuel -> semGenSize (backtrackFuel fuel tot l) size <--> (\bigcup_(x in (l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: (semGenSize x.2 size))) :|: ([set None] :&: (\bigcap_(x in l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0)) (semGenSize x.2 size))).
by rewrite setI_comm !nil_set_eq setI_set0_abs bigcup_set0 bigcap_set0 setU_comm setU_set0_neut setI_setT_neut semReturnSize.

Lemma semBacktrackSize {A} (l : list (nat * G (option A))) size : semGenSize (backtrack l) size <--> (\bigcup_(x in (l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: (semGenSize x.2 size))) :|: ([set None] :&: (\bigcap_(x in l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0)) (semGenSize x.2 size))).

Lemma bigcup_cons_setI_subset_compat_backtrack {A} (n : nat) (g g' : G (option A)) (l l' : seq (nat * G (option A))) s : isSome :&: semGenSize g s \subset isSome :&: semGenSize g' s -> \bigcup_(x in (l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s) \subset \bigcup_(x in (l' :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s) -> \bigcup_(x in (((n, g) :: l) :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s) \subset \bigcup_(x in (((n, g') :: l') :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s).
intros H1 H2 x [y [[Hin1 Hin2] [Hin3 Hin4]]].

Lemma bigcup_cons_setI_subset_pres_backtrack {A} (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) (l l' : seq (nat * G (option A))) s : \bigcup_(x in (l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s) \subset \bigcup_(x in (l' :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s) -> \bigcup_(x in (l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s) \subset \bigcup_(x in ((n, g) :: l') :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0)) (isSome :&: semGenSize x.2 s).

Lemma semBacktrack_sound : forall (A : Type) (l : seq (nat * G (option A))), semGen (backtrack l) \subset (\bigcup_(x in (l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: (semGen x.2))) :|: ([set None] :&: (\bigcap_(x in l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0)) (semGen x.2))).
Lemma semBacktrack_complete : forall (A : Type) (l : seq (nat * G (option A))), \bigcup_(x in (l :&: (fun x => x.1 <> 0))) (isSome :&: (semGen x.2)) \subset semGen (backtrack l).
intros A l x [y [[Hin1 Hin2] [Hin3 Hin4]]].

Lemma semFoldGen_right : forall {A B : Type} (f : A -> B -> G A) (bs : list B) (a0 : A) (s : nat), semGenSize (foldGen f bs a0) s <--> [ set an | foldr (fun b p => [set a_prev | exists a, a \in (semGenSize (f a_prev b) s :&: p)]) [set an] bs a0].
move => A B f bs a0 s.
elim : bs a0 => [| b bs IHbs] a0 an.
Definition genPair {A B : Type} (ga : G A) (gb : G B) : G (A * B) := liftGen2 pair ga gb.
Definition curry {A B C : Type} (f : A * B -> C) (a : A) (b : B) := f (a,b).
Definition uncurry {A B C : Type} (f : A -> B -> C) (ab : A * B) := match ab with | (a,b) => f a b end.
Lemma mergeBinds : forall A B C (ga : G A) (gb : G B) (f : A -> B -> G C), semGen (bindGen ga (fun x => bindGen gb (f x))) <--> semGen (bindGen (genPair ga gb) (uncurry f)).
split; intros [s [_ H]]; exists s; split; try by [].
destruct H as [[a b] [[a' [Ha [b' [Hb H]]]] Hc]].
Notation " 'elems' [ x ] " := (elements x (cons x nil)) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'elems' [ x ; y ] " := (elements x (cons x (cons y nil))) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'elems' [ x ; y ; .. ; z ] " := (elements x (cons x (cons y .. (cons z nil) ..))) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'elems' ( x ;; l ) " := (elements x (cons x l)) (at level 1, no associativity) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'oneOf' [ x ] " := (oneof x (cons x nil)) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'oneOf' [ x ; y ] " := (oneof x (cons x (cons y nil))) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'oneOf' [ x ; y ; .. ; z ] " := (oneof x (cons x (cons y .. (cons z nil) ..))) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'oneOf' ( x ;; l ) " := (oneof x (cons x l)) (at level 1, no associativity) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'freq' [ ( n , x ) ; y ] " := (frequency x (cons (n, x) (cons y nil))) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'freq' [ ( n , x ) ; y ; .. ; z ] " := (frequency x (cons (n, x) (cons y .. (cons z nil) ..))) : qc_scope.
Notation " 'freq' ( ( n , x ) ;; l ) " := (frequency x (cons (n, x) l)) (at level 1, no associativity) : qc_scope.
Notation "'do!' X <- A ; B" := (bindGen A (fun X => B)) (at level 200, X ident, A at level 100, B at level 200).
Notation "'doM!' X <- A ; B" := (bindGenOpt A (fun X => B)) (at level 200, X ident, A at level 100, B at level 200).
Lemma semElemsSize A (x : A) xs s : semGenSize (elems (x ;; xs)) s <--> x :: xs.
Lemma semOneOfSize A (g0 : G A) (gs : list (G A)) s : semGenSize (oneOf (g0 ;; gs)) s <--> \bigcup_(g in (g0 :: gs)) semGenSize g s.
Lemma semElems A (x : A) xs : semGen (elems (x ;; xs)) <--> x :: xs.
Lemma semOneOf A (g0 : G A) (gs : list (G A)) : semGen (oneOf (g0 ;; gs)) <--> \bigcup_(g in (g0 :: gs)) semGen g.
Definition betterSized {A} (f : nat -> G A) := sized (fun x => bindGen (choose (0, x)) f).
Program Instance betterSizedIndeedBetter {A} (f : nat -> G A) (H: forall s, SizeMonotonic (f s)) : SizeMonotonic (betterSized f).
split; last by eapply monotonic; eauto.
Instance bindOptMonotonicOpt {A B} (g : G (option A)) (f : A -> G (option B)) `{SizeMonotonicOpt _ g} `{forall x, SizeMonotonicOpt (f x)} : SizeMonotonicOpt (bindGenOpt g f).
apply semReturnSize in Hb; discriminate Hb.
Instance bindOptMonotonic {A B} (g : G (option A)) (f : A -> G (option B)) `{SizeMonotonic _ g} `{forall x, SizeMonotonic (f x)} : SizeMonotonic (bindGenOpt g f).
eapply H in Hg; try eassumption.
eapply H0 in Hf; try eassumption.
eapply H in Hg; try eassumption.

Lemma semBindOptSizeMonotonicIncl_r {A B} (g : G (option A)) (f : A -> G (option B)) (s1 : set A) (s2 : A -> set B) : semGen g \subset (Some @: s1) :|: [set None] -> (forall x, semGen (f x) \subset Some @: (s2 x) :|: [set None]) -> semGen (bindGenOpt g f) \subset Some @: (\bigcup_(a in s1) s2 a) :|: [set None].

Lemma semBindOptSizeMonotonicIncl_l {A B} (g : G (option A)) (f : A -> G (option B)) (s1 : set A) (fs : A -> set B) `{Hg : SizeMonotonicOpt _ g} `{Hf : forall a, SizeMonotonicOpt (f a)} : Some @: s1 \subset semGen g -> (forall x, Some @: (fs x) \subset semGen (f x)) -> (Some @: \bigcup_(a in s1) (fs a)) \subset semGen (bindGenOpt g f).

Lemma semBindOptSizeOpt_subset_compat {A B : Type} (g g' : G (option A)) (f f' : A -> G (option B)) : (forall s, isSome :&: semGenSize g s \subset isSome :&: semGenSize g' s) -> (forall x s, isSome :&: semGenSize (f x) s \subset isSome :&: semGenSize (f' x) s) -> (forall s, isSome :&: semGenSize (bindGenOpt g f) s \subset isSome :&: semGenSize (bindGenOpt g' f') s).
intros Hg Hf s x [Hin1 Hin2].
assert (Hg'' : ((fun u : option A => u) :&: semGenSize g s) (Some a)).
Global Instance Monad_GOpt : Monad GOpt := { ret A x := returnGen (Some x); bind A B := bindGenOpt; }.

Lemma semSize_retryBody {A} (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) (s : nat) : match n with | S n' => semGenSize (retry n' g) s <--> semGenSize g s | O => True end -> semGenSize (retryBody retry n g) s <--> semGenSize g s.
apply semReturnSize in Ha; inversion Ha; auto.
Lemma semSize_retry {A} (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) (s : nat) : semGenSize (retry n g) s <--> semGenSize g s.
Lemma semSizeOpt_retry {A} (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) (s : nat) : semGenSizeOpt (retry n g) s <--> semGenSizeOpt g s.
Lemma semSizeOpt_suchThatMaybe1 {A : Type} (g : G A) (p : A -> bool) (s : nat) : semGenSizeOpt (suchThatMaybe1 g p) s <--> semGenSize g s :&: p.
destruct (p a') eqn:Hp'; inversion Hp; subst.
Lemma semSizeOpt_suchThatMaybe {A : Type} (g : G A) (p : A -> bool) (s : nat) : semGenSizeOpt (suchThatMaybe g p) s <--> semGenSize g s :&: p.
Lemma semSizeOpt_suchThatMaybeOpt {A : Type} (g : G (option A)) (p : A -> bool) (s : nat) : semGenSizeOpt (suchThatMaybeOpt g p) s <--> semGenSizeOpt g s :&: p.
destruct Ha as [[ a'| ] [Hg Ha]]; inversion Ha.

Instance Monotonic_retry {A} (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) : SizeMonotonic g -> SizeMonotonic (retry n g).
Instance MonotonicOpt_retry {A} (n : nat) (g : G (option A)) : SizeMonotonicOpt g -> SizeMonotonicOpt (retry n g).
Instance Monotonic_suchThatMaybe1 {A : Type} (g : G A) (f : A -> bool) : SizeMonotonic g -> SizeMonotonic (suchThatMaybe1 g f).
Instance MonotonicOpt_suchThatMaybe1 {A : Type} (g : G A) (f : A -> bool) : SizeMonotonic g -> SizeMonotonicOpt (suchThatMaybe1 g f).
Instance Monotonic_suchThatMaybe {A : Type} (g : G A) (f : A -> bool) : SizeMonotonic g -> SizeMonotonic (suchThatMaybe g f).
Instance MonotonicOpt_suchThatMaybe {A : Type} (g : G A) (f : A -> bool) : SizeMonotonic g -> SizeMonotonicOpt (suchThatMaybe g f).
Instance MonotonicOpt_suchThatMaybeOpt {A : Type} (g : G (option A)) (f : A -> bool) : SizeMonotonicOpt g -> SizeMonotonicOpt (suchThatMaybeOpt g f).
